Articles.Content:
Hi KSP world,

thought I'd come out and introduce myself. Been playing KSP since whatever the version before 0.9 was. Met a Swedish guy on a plane to cape town and he showed me KSP. Looked interesting. Tried it. Hooked. I've only been able to spend 60h with it over the last year or so, but with the limited time I have that means all I'm playing when I have a chance to play at all is KSP. Started two career games. First one pre 0.9 got me to the MÃƒÂ¼n and Minmus. My current career in 1.0.2 got me to these two places plus taught me how to rendezvous, dock and do satellite contracts. Great fun so far.

Currently playing around with airplanes and gearing up to launch my first space station. Been lurking for a while, reading posts, watching videos and scouring the Wiki. Very helpful community. Thanks to everyone who has put the effort in so far!

Oh, and 39 yo, 2 kids, limited time ;-)

Hello arien101, and welcome to the forums!

This is pretty much the only game I play anymore. Glad to see you've decided to join this amazing community.

Happy landings!
